articles.content: This standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
For foods which have their own sanitation standards, those standards shall be applied to the respective foods.
Products shall have their original pleasant flavor and color. No putridity, discoloration, off odor or flavor, contamination, moulds, foreign matter or parasite shall be found.

The maximum level of microorganism:
